projects.title: DX Hold (Hold Monitor System) - ME
projects.currentPhase: Final testing and user validation for FY25 will be completed, followed by full implementation and deployment of the FY25 version. Quick bug fixes and targeted improvements will also be addressed.

nextSteps.2025-12: Stage 2 of the DxHold Monitor system focuses on creating a systematic analysis to provide clearer, integrated insights. Visual improvements and enhanced information search will be implemented, along with evaluating new data-integration options from systems like ESSYM and AS400. Continuous data-update meetings will be maintained, and automatic escalation will be triggered for amounts exceeding $500,000.

timeline.currentPhase: Final testing and user validation for FY25 will be completed, followed by full implementation and deployment of the FY25 version. Quick bug fixes and targeted improvements will also be addressed.

projects.title: Jsox Dashboard
projects.currentPhase: The project will begin by converting the database from XLS to XLSX using both provider and internal sources through the DX Team. The data will then be transformed to extract all required information. A dashboard visualization will be created based on the provided PPT. Pilot tests will be conducted, and the final solution will be delivered to the QDOC Team along with a walkthrough of its functionality.

timeline.currentPhase: The project will begin by converting the database from XLS to XLSX using both provider and internal sources through the DX Team. The data will then be transformed to extract all required information. A dashboard visualization will be created based on the provided PPT. Pilot tests will be conducted, and the final solution will be delivered to the QDOC Team along with a walkthrough of its functionality.

projects.title: IMDS Automation Workflow
projects.currentPhase: This project is currently in the Pilot phase. Together with the IMDS team, I am conducting tests to verify that the results are indeed as expected.

achievements.2025/12: Certain inconsistencies were identified in the data export generated by the iPoint Compliance Agent portal. This finding proved significant, as it allowed us to understand that the issue was not so much with the macro used, but rather with the way the portal performs the data export.
achievements.2026-01: The macro was successfully updated to capture the COMPONENT PART NUMBER and COMPONENT PENDING NAME associated with the ‚ÄúThe hidden substance‚Ä¶‚Äù warning. Further work is in progress to fine-tune the remaining details.
achievements.2026/01: I have finished correcting and adding what was necessary for the Macro to work. I'm currently waiting for feedback.

nextSteps.2026/01: Review and incorporate feedback (if necessary) from the IMDS team.

projects.concept: The purpose of this project is to explore options to help the IMDS team automate their workflow.
